plays.text: Goal scored by CHRISTIAN BERGLUND assisted by Jason Arnott and Petr Sykora
Goal scored by Zdeno Ciger assisted by Jassen Cullimore and Juha Ylonen
Penalty to Zdeno Ciger 2 minutes for Interference Colin White
Penalty to Colin White 2 minutes for Slashing Zdeno Ciger
Penalty to Petr Sykora 2 minutes for Hooking Jassen Cullimore
Goal scored by MARTIN ST. LOUIS assisted by Vincent Lecavalier and Zdeno Ciger
Penalty to CHRISTIAN BERGLUND 2 minutes for Holding Juha Ylonen
Goal scored by John Madden assisted by CHRISTIAN BERGLUND and Scott Stevens
Penalty to Colin White 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Zdeno Ciger assisted by Vincent Lecavalier and Juha Ylonen
Goal scored by Vincent Lecavalier unassisted
Penalty to Vincent Lecavalier 2 minutes for Tripping Jason Arnott
Goal scored by Petr Sykora assisted by Scott Gomez and Jason Arnott
Penalty to Jiri Bicek 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Kevin Weekes
Penalty to Dave Andreychuk 2 minutes for Tripping Sergei Nemchinov
Goal scored by Patrik Elias assisted by Scott Gomez and Sergei Nemchinov
Goal scored by Zdeno Ciger unassisted
